Preterit.text: naḥətno ono, mšamleli ʻI went down and burned incenseʼ; 789; 40/5, 14;

Infectum.text: hawi čāx d-u=šəmloyo, aš=šamoše lə=naḥiti d-mšamlən ʻwhen it was time for burning of incense, deacons did not go down to burn incenseʼ; 789; 40/4;

Part act..text: ḥa mənne k-owe mšamlono, w a=ḥrene k-əmmi qole ʻeiner von ihnen schwingt das Rauchfass, die anderen singen geistliche Gesängeʼ; 790; 94/37, 38;

Infinitiv.text: hawi čāx d-u=šəmloyo, aš=šamoše lə=naḥiti də-mšamlən ʻwhen it was time for burning of incense, deacons did not go down to burn incenseʼ; 789-790; 40/4;
